content: crochet puppy glasses holder as gift for mother kids or your friend size of ready toy is about 16x9 cm/ 6x4 inches size of the toys depended from yarn thickness hook thickness or solidity of crocheting materials  yarn yarnart jeans 50g/160m 55% cotton/45% pac fine 2 i use 2 thread togeter main colour beige #07 and additional white #01  crotchet hook 3 5 mm  beads 8 mm with felt or eyes 12-15 mm  fiberfill
